text: nishchay ve kaafir[1] ho gaye, jinhonne kaha ki maryam ka putr maseehî€¼ hee allaah hai. (he nabee!) unase kah do ki yadi allalaah maryam ke putr aur usakee maata tatha jo bhee dharatee mein hai, sabaka vinaash kar dena chaahe, to kisamen shakti hai ki vah use rok de? tatha aakaash aur dharatee aur jo bhee inake beech hai, sab allaah hee ka raajy hai, vah jo chaahe, utapann karata hai tatha vah jo chaahe, kar sakata hai
